ModMetaData.name: Drug Vents
ModMetaData.author: carterz30cal
ModMetaData.description:
- Adds vents for some drugs which work similarly to the autobong structure - They are not ideoligion locked, but do require tougher research than the autobong. - Can be used as a utility to quickly give your colonists drugs, or as a weapon on raiders! - Completely unbalanced!
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.0</color>
